attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore to be given knighthood for his incredible contribution
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore is a inspiration to all of us, he is a true Hero, at 99 years old and he is achieving more than most, his contribution to the fight against Covid -19 for all of us is unprecedented, lest we forget his contribution in the war we owe him our greatest gratitude. Captain Tom Moore is a Legend...
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore to be given a MBE for his contribution to the fight against Covid-19

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
